name: Lin Zhao
core_wound: Lost her family in an industrial accident caused by corporate negligence, received no compensation, has lived in Level 8 for 30 years
wants: To survive with dignity, to see justice for workers
needs: To trust others again, to believe collective action can work
voice_markers: Speaks bluntly, no patience for bullshit
Dark humor about poverty and suffering
contradiction: Deeply cynical about change but can't stop trying to help her neighbors; claims not to care but is first to help in crisis
physical_description: Chinese elder, gray hair in practical bun, weathered face with laugh lines, arthritic hands from decades of manual labor, sharp eyes that miss nothing
skills: Community organizing from decades of experience
Practical skills - cooking, repair work, first aid
Memory like steel - knows everyone's story
flaws: Sometimes too quick to dismiss hope as naive
Won't leave Level 8 even when given opportunity
knowledge_state_book1_start: 30 years of Level 8 history and politics
Who can be trusted, who's an informant
Every family's story in her housing block

relationships.Nico Chen: Dismisses him as another junkie dealer at first, slowly becomes mentor/grandmother figure
relationships.Level 8 community: Respected elder, people come to her for advice and conflict resolution
relationships.Commander Wright: Represents everything wrong with people who forget where they came from
relationships.Maya Torres: Respects her for coming back to help, wishes she'd break more rules
